structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 71, effective January 1, 2010; and amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 70, effective March 17, 2009. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 4, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 17, effective January 1, 2007. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 275, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 357, sec. 4, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 209, sec. 14, effective March 30, 1998. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4149b-4, 4161, 4164, 4165.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Who may pay certificates of delinquency -- Remedies for failure to release lien or surrender certified copy after payment -- Assignment -- Clerk to receive and record payments -- Records as evidence.
